metadata.Plot: Dan Burton, an undercover investigator from America, is sent to the rain forests of the Amazon to investigate reports of slave-labor on the company';s rubber plantation. Along with his aide, "Tiny' Andrews, they encounter a daughter, Judith Adams, searching for her father, a missing scientist, brutal plantation bosses and a case or two of insanity.
metadata.Writer: Michael L. Simmons, Maurice Tombragel, Ben Pivar
metadata.Actors: Richard Arlen, Andy Devine, Beverly Roberts
